title: 14 Weeks
description: I was a bit of a wild child.I had a past.I had gotten into trouble. All that was behind me, though.And for the first time in my life, trouble had found me.When the other private investigators wouldn’t help me, I found the huge, hulking Tig willing to lend his expertise. What I didn’t expect was the growing attraction between us or the crazy series of events that would put our budding relationship to the test.Tig + Kenzi's story.For possible triggers, please visit: http://www.jessicagadziala.com/trigge...
author: Jessica Gadziala
